name: Pixel Escape
description:
Pixel escape is a single player game where you have to escape out of the house in order to win the game. To win the game you must collect all 3 keys in each room to escape you can find these keys  behind furniture in chest boxes and under carpet once you find these 3 keys you may enter the next room.

Key Features

~ Collecting keys
~ Escaping rooms
~ 7 levels of rooms including bedroom, 
  bathroom, study room and more 
~ Escaping the house 
~ Top left is the key counter 

 Relsease date 18th June 2019
